ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: This research was supported in part by the grant (1-BBWD) from the Research Institute for Sustainable Urban Development, the Hong Kong Polytechnic University; and grants of 1-ZE24 and 1-ZVN6 from the Hong Kong Polytechnic University. The authors are grateful for the census data from the Hong Kong Census and Statistics Department, Landsat satellite images from the NASA LP DAAC, U.S., the ground-based meteorological data from the Hong Kong Observatory, GIS data from the Hong Kong Lands Department, and the Tertiary Planning Unit from the Planning Department of Hong Kong.
